mapper.select: select j.job_id as jobId ,j.company_id as companyId ,c.logo as companyLogo ,j.title as title ,c.name as companyName ,j.location as location ,j.experience_level as experienceLevel ,d.disability_name as disabilityTypeName ,j.deadline as deadline from job_posting j JOIN company c ON j.company_id = c.company_id LEFT JOIN disability_types d ON j.disability_type = d.id
